name: Run a Circle
description:
This is an entry for Ludum Dare 47 (Theme: stuck in a loop) made in 2 days.

It's an endless runner made in a minimalist style placed in a circle. Your goal is to run around it, avoid procedurally generated walls, and hit the highest score you can.

My highest score is 107. Can you beat it?

Controls:

C - switch inner/outer side

Space - jump
